New Records: Framber Valdez threw seven no-hit innings
Houston Astros have five no-hit bids of seven innings or more in 2024
Key Match Events: Jose Altuve hit a game-winning double in the bottom of the ninth inning
Paul DeJong hit a two-run homer in the top of the ninth inning
Josh Hader's consecutive save streak was snapped at 29
Pre-Game Insights: Framber Valdez's performance and preparation were discussed by the manager
Valdez's pitching strategy and effectiveness were highlighted
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Joe Espada praised Valdez's performance and the team's resilience
Players and manager reflected on the win and its significance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Valdez had a strong record in his last 10 starts
The game was a walk-off win for the Astros
The Royals had limited opportunities to score
